title: Tegan Martin makes an embarrassing blunder by sharing a snap of herself 'doing her tax'
text:
She's the pageant queen-turned-Instagram model who spruiks everything from Bali health retreats to blenders.

And on Sunday, Tegan Martin, 27, tried her hand at promoting a Sydney tax accountancy firm by uploading two glamorous Instagram snaps of herself poring over a notebook at her desk.

'My tax is officially up to date!' the blonde enthused in her caption, before revealing she'd earned herself a 'huge bonus' this financial year thanks to her accountant.

Can YOU spot what's wrong with this photo? Former Miss Universe Australia Tegan Martin, 27, made an embarrassing blunder on Sunday when she shared two snaps of herself 'doing her tax'

However, eagle-eyed fans quickly noticed that the book Tegan was staring at was completely blank.

'I see blank pages,' one follower commented on the post.

The faux pas didn't stop many of Tegan's devoted fans from gushing over the former reality star, however, with one commenting: 'Absolutely slaying doing the taxes and wow those glasses stunning!'

Forgetting something? Eagle-eyed fans quickly noticed that the book Tegan was staring at was completely blank

'My tax is officially up to date!' The blonde enthused as she shared two images of herself staring at the blank pages

'I see blank pages': One follower remarked upon on the mysteriously empty notebook in front of Tegan

'So pretty,' another agreed.

It comes after Tegan revealed she once considered deleting social media altogether after being bombarded with photos of bikini models.

'There are days where if it wasn't part of my job, I would just delete it,' the model revealed in a press release promoting Bras N Things' latest swimwear collection.

'There are days where if it wasn't part of my job, I would just delete it': It comes after Tegan revealed she once considered deleting social media altogether after being bombarded with photos of bikini models

'If you are a teenage girl that is struggling mentally, in regards to what you can do, unfollow accounts that don't make you feel good,' she explained.

'There was a stage for me where I unfollowed all of the accounts that were just bikini accounts because it didn't make me feel good when I woke up and scrolled through that in the morning.'

Tegan became a household name after being crowned Miss Universe Australia in June 2014.
description: She's the pageant queen-turned-Instagram model who spruiks everything from Bali health retreats to blenders.
